body_content.explanation: abbreviation for high-occupancy vehicle lane: a lane (= a section ) on a wide road that is only to be used by a vehicle that carries a lot of people such as a bus, or by a car with a driver and one or more passengers, or sometimes by other vehicles that must pay a charge:
examples: Solo drivers in Houston will pay a steep price to ride in the HOV lanes.
The freeway will be expanded to four lanes each side, plus HOV lanes.
